com.mps.pearl.core

Class Election

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mps.pearl.core.Election

  • public class Election
extends java.lang.Object
    This class implements an Election. Election is a process to select a Coordinator Node ( Server Node ) among set of available Nodes in a System.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.Object lock
      Object used as lock to provide mutual exclusion for the running threads in a System

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Begin Election process in a System

      Close the Election and declare the new coordinator

      Returns the Election message which contains vector of Nodes who are involved in an Election

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static Election getInstance()
        Returns the unique Election object associated with this System, if any.
        Returns:
        instance the Election instance

      • getElectionNodeList

        public java.util.LinkedHashMap<java.lang.Integer,Node> getElectionNodeList()
        Returns the List of Nodes which are involved in the Election process in a System
        Returns:
        the list which is bound to the Election, or null if the list is unbound.

      • beginElection

        public void beginElection()
        Begin Election process in a System

      • isValidElection

        public boolean isValidElection(int indexId)
        Returns the valid state of the Election in a System. The Election is valid, if the Id of Node which initiated the Election is greater than all the other nodes
        Parameters:
        indexId - the Id of the Node who wants to vaildate the state of election
        Returns:
        True, if the election is valid election, False, If election is not a valid election

      • addElectionNode

        public void addElectionNode(Node node)
        Add the current Node to the Election List
        Parameters:
        node - The Node to be added in a Election Node List

      • abortElection

        public void abortElection()
        Abort Election process in a System

      • getElectionMessage

        public java.lang.String getElectionMessage()
        Returns the Election message which contains vector of Nodes who are involved in an Election
        Returns:
        Message A String of the vector Nodes of the Election

      • endElection

        public Node endElection()
        Close the Election and declare the new coordinator
        Returns:
        Node The Node declared as new coordinator

      • isElectionFlag

        public boolean isElectionFlag()
        Returns the state of the Election
        Returns:
        True, if Election is running, False, if Election is not running

      • setElectionFlag

        public void setElectionFlag(boolean isElectionFlag)
        Set the Election State of the System
        Parameters:
        isElectionFlag - True, if the Election is running, False, if Election not running
